alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Tift; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 15 at 6:34AM EST until December 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 590 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE MADISON TAYLOR IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES TIFT TURNER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, ASHBURN, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHERRY LAKE, CHULA, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DAY, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HARDING, HINES, HOBBY, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, JARROTT, JONESBORO, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, OLD TOWN, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, SUNSWEET, TEETERVILLE, TIFTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WATERLOO, WEBER, WESTWOOD, WORTH, AND YELLOW JACKET.
